Plot: A dramatic thriller based on real events that reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.
Title: The Fifth Estate
Writer: Daniel Domscheit-Berg (book), David Leigh (book), Luke Harding (book), Josh Singer (screenplay)
Actors: Peter Capaldi, David Thewlis, Anatole Taubman, Alexander Beyer
tomatoConsensus: Heavy on detail and melodrama but missing the spark from its remarkable real-life inspiration, The Fifth Estate mostly serves as a middling showcase for Benedict Cumberbatch's remarkable talent.
